name: test_e2e_with_logs[163_CMD_BLIND_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_BLIND_001` |
| **Name** | Time-based blind command injection |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | blind_command_injection |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `; sleep 10`
- **Encoded**: `%3B%20sleep%2010`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~24000ms
- **Timestamp**: 05:07:57.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=CMD_BLIND_001-1767071277637-b9dk29 pattern_id=CMD_BLIND_001 uri=/?q=%3B%20sleep%2010 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
05:07:57.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Time-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=CMD_BLIND_001-1767071277637-b9dk29 pattern_id=CMD_BLIND_001 uri=/?q=%3B%20sleep%2010 client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
